attributes.action: change the laws on amending birth certificate information for children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: According to the 1953 Registration of Births and Deaths Section 3 changes cannot be made to a child's birth certificate. In this new era in which we live, DNA tests and freedom of choice, details are being registered and now found to be wrong. A child has the right to carry an official birth certificate showing the correct details of their parentage and not one which has been proven to be wrong for whatever reason at the time of original registration.
